item.title: Zero-Shot Dense Retrieval with Embeddings from Relevance Feedback
item.description: ReDE-RF revolutionizes zero-shot dense retrieval by using relevance feedback from LLMs to refine query embeddings, achieving state-of-the-art results with vastly improved efficiency.
